## Methods

<table><thead><tr><th>

Method


</th><th>

Modifiers


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[build()](./sdk-core.relayedtransactionv2builder.build.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Tries to build the relayed v2 transaction based on the previously set fields. It returns a transaction that isn't signed


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[setInnerTransaction(transaction)](./sdk-core.relayedtransactionv2builder.setinnertransaction.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Sets the inner transaction to be used. It has to be already signed and with gasLimit set to 0. These checks are performed on the build() method


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[setInnerTransactionGasLimit(gasLimit)](./sdk-core.relayedtransactionv2builder.setinnertransactiongaslimit.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Sets the gas limit to be used for the SC Call inside the inner transaction


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[setNetworkConfig(netConfig)](./sdk-core.relayedtransactionv2builder.setnetworkconfig.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Sets the network config to be used for building the relayed v2 transaction


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[setRelayerAddress(relayerAddress)](./sdk-core.relayedtransactionv2builder.setrelayeraddress.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Sets the address of the relayer (the one that will actually pay the fee)


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[setRelayerNonce(relayerNonce)](./sdk-core.relayedtransactionv2builder.setrelayernonce.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

(optional) Sets the nonce of the relayer


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
